title: FS: Small T206 Ed Willetts Back Run Graded
author: rp12367

posts.post_title: FS: Small T206 Ed Willetts Back Run Graded
posts.post_content:
FS: I was looking to do a back run of this card. I have 3 other runs going, so I have decided to sell this run. All cards are a true to grade. Looking for $175 shipped w/dc. Price is firm, that is less than I have into these cards. Thanks in advance, Ralph SALE PENDING
Cards are as follows:

American Beauty 460 PSA 1.5
Piedmont 350 PSA 2
Polar Bear PSA 2
Sweet Caporal 350 PSA 2
Sweet Caporal 350-460 Overprint -Fact 42 - Both Factories Show PSA 4 (tiny paper loss on back accounts for grade)

Hi Ralph

Email sent.

TED Z
A Pie Fact42 should be coming on here fairly soon as well.
